Class ViewFormatter

java.lang.Object
utils.formatter.ViewFormatter
public class ViewFormatter extends Object
Reusable component for all view display operations. Consolidates common display methods used across views and formatters. Provides header formatting, input parsing, and ID extraction utilities.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewFormatter

      private ViewFormatter()
      Private constructor to prevent instantiation. This is a utility class with only static methods.

  • Method Details

    • displayLargeHeader

      public static void displayLargeHeader(String title, String border, int width)
      Displays a large centered header for main titles. Provides biggest visual presence with centered text.
      Parameters:
      title - The title text to display
      border - The border string
      width - The width for centering

    • displayHeader

      public static void displayHeader(String title, String border, int width)
      Displays a centered header for menus and dashboards. Smaller than large header, indented with 2 spaces.
      Parameters:
      title - The title text to display
      border - The border string
      width - The width for layout

    • displaySmallHeader

      public static void displaySmallHeader(String title, String border, int width)
      Displays a small header for filters and sub-sections. Smallest header size, indented with 2 spaces.
      Parameters:
      title - The title text to display
      border - The border string
      width - The width for layout

    • displayFilterFooter

      public static void displayFilterFooter(FilterSettings filterSettings)
      Displays a filter footer showing active filters.
      Parameters:
      filterSettings - The filter settings to display (null for no footer)

    • waitForEnter

      public static void waitForEnter(Scanner sc)
      Waits for user to press Enter before continuing.
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner to read input from

    • parseInt

      public static int parseInt(String s, int max)
      Parses an integer with a fallback value. Returns max + 1 if parsing fails (indicates invalid input).
      Parameters:
      s - The string to parse
      max - The maximum valid value
      Returns:
      Parsed integer or max + 1 if invalid

    • extractIDFromString

      public static int extractIDFromString(String str)
      Extracts an integer ID from a formatted string. Looks for pattern "ID: <number>".
      Parameters:
      str - The formatted string
      Returns:
      The extracted ID, or -1 if not found or invalid

    • extractStringIDFromString

      public static String extractStringIDFromString(String str)
      Extracts a string ID from a formatted string. Looks for pattern "ID: <id>".
      Parameters:
      str - The formatted string
      Returns:
      The extracted ID string, or null if not found

    • extractIDString

      private static String extractIDString(String str)
      Common ID extraction logic shared by integer and string ID extractors. Extracts text between "ID: " and next " |" delimiter or end of string. Used internally by extractIDFromString and extractStringIDFromString.
      Parameters:
      str - The string to extract ID from
      Returns:
      The extracted ID string, or null if "ID: " pattern not found

    • centerText

      public static String centerText(String text, int width)
      Centers text within a specified width by adding leading spaces. Calculates padding needed to center text and adds appropriate spacing.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to center
      width - The total width for centering
      Returns:
      Centered text with leading spaces
